info.description: API server for the Konnect Platform
info.title: Konnect

get.description: Get all organizations that the authenticated user belongs to

post.description: Create a new organization for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific organization by ID

parameters.description: Service name, supports searching the passed string in the name of the service
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Sort order for the list of services. Accepted values are asc and desc. Default is desc(assumes default on invalid values as well)
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: The field on which sorting to be applied, supports name, created_at, updated_at. Default is updated_at(assumes default on invalid values as well)
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Page number for pagination (0-based). Default is 0
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default is 10, max is 100, assumes 100 if >100 is passed
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Additional data to include (comma-separated). Supported values: versionCount
parameters.name: include

parameters.description: Additional data to include (comma-separated). Supported values: versionCount
parameters.name: include

get.description: Gets all the versions available for the specified service
get.summary: Get All versions of a service

parameters.description: version, supports searching with version prefix, for example: passing 1 would return versions like 1.0.1,1.1.4 etc, passing 1.0 would return 1.0.3,1.0.7 etc
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Sort order for the list of service versions. Accepted values are asc and desc. Default is desc(assumes default on invalid values as well)
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: The field on which sorting to be applied, supports version, created_at, updated_at. Default is updated_at(assumes default on invalid values as well)
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Page number for pagination (0-based). Default is 0
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Number of items per page. Default is 10, max is 100, assumes 100 if >100 is passed
parameters.name: per_page

post.description:
Creates a version for the specified service
version value must be a semantic version and releaseTimestamp must be valid RFC3339 timestamp
post.summary: Create a version for a service

get.description: Get particular version by id for the specified service
get.summary: Get a version of a service

delete.description: Deletes the specified version of a service
delete.summary: Delete a version for a service

patch.description: Updates the specified version of a service, version tag cannot be updated
patch.summary: Update a version for a service

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

200.description: Contains user info and JWT token

createdAt.description:
gorm:"<-:create" only allows create and read but not update
this is avoid updating created_at with a zero value by mistake

this is avoid updating created_at with a zero value by mistake

this is avoid updating created_at with a zero value by mistake
